summary: In small town Tennessee, a ne'er-do-well man (Knoxville) wrestling for control over his fading golf club is reunited with his estranged daughter, a 14-year-old musical prodigy.
cast: Elizabeth Banks|Johnny Knoxville|Beth Grant|Laura Cayouette|Thomas Jackson Burt|Ken Jackson|Sophie Traub|David Koechner|Matthew Sharp|James Parks|Kick Gurry|Juliette Lewis|Andrew Prine|Linda Wylie|Carri O'Neill|Sammye Sowell|Bob King|Gatlin Kate James|Kelsey Stinson|Natalie Stinson|Laura Gant|Rachel Gant|Lawrence Bull Jr.|Preston Crook|James Holmes|Libby McDermott|Ron Pecorella|Patrick Purser|Craig Sawyer|Kristin Shrader|Woody Woodruff
title: Daltry Calhoun
